search.query: | tstats SummariesOnly=True Allow_Old_Summaries=False count Latest(Search_Activity.Audit_Search.emp_lob11) As emp_lob1 Latest(Search_Activity.Audit_Search.emp_lob21) As emp_lob2 Latest(Search_Activity.Audit_Search.emp_lob31) As emp_lob3 Latest(Search_Activity.Audit_Search.emp_dep1) As emp_dep From DataModel=GMC Where nodename=Search_Activity.Audit_Search index=_audit earliest=$TimeRangePkr.earliest$ latest=$TimeRangePkr.latest$ By Search_Activity.Audit_Search.user1 | `gmc_drop_dm_object_name(Search_Activity.Audit_Search)` | rename user1 As user | fields user emp_* ``` | lookup splunk_rest_identities_kv_store_lookup identity as user OUTPUTNEW emp_lob2 emp_dep | lookup splunk_identities_exceptions_sh_csv_lookup identity as user OUTPUTNEW emp_lob2 emp_dep ``` | fillnull value="NO-Market-Data" emp_lob2 | fillnull value="NO-Department-Data" emp_dep | search emp_lob2 IN ($emp_lob2$) emp_dep IN ($emp_dep$) user IN ($user$)

| tstats SummariesOnly=True Allow_Old_Summaries=False Sum(Search_Activity.Audit_Search.total_run_time1) AS user_total_run_time Latest(Search_Activity.Audit_Search.emp_lob11) As emp_lob1 Latest(Search_Activity.Audit_Search.emp_lob21) As emp_lob2 Latest(Search_Activity.Audit_Search.emp_lob31) As emp_lob3 Latest(Search_Activity.Audit_Search.emp_dep1) As emp_dep Latest(Search_Activity.Audit_Search.emp_title1) As emp_title From DataModel=GMC Where nodename=Search_Activity.Audit_Search index=_audit earliest=$TimeRangePkr.earliest$ latest=$TimeRangePkr.latest$ AND Search_Activity.Audit_Search.total_run_time1 > 0 By _time Span=$time_bin$ Search_Activity.Audit_Search.user1 | `gmc_drop_dm_object_name(Search_Activity.Audit_Search)` | rename user1 As user | fields _time user user_total_run_time emp_* | eventstats sum(user_total_run_time) As grand_total_run_time by _time | join _time [ search index=summary source="splunk-virtual-core-usage" | timechart Span=1d Max(total_util) As Utilization Max(License) As License | fields _time Utilization License ] ``` | lookup splunk_rest_identities_kv_store_lookup identity as user OUTPUTNEW emp_name emp_lob2 emp_dep emp_title ``` | fillnull value="NO-Market-Data" emp_lob2 | fillnull value="NO-Department-Data" emp_dep | fields _time user emp_name emp_title emp_dep emp_lob2 user_total_run_time user_total_run_time_perc grand_total_run_time Utilization License svc_usage | search emp_lob2 IN ($emp_lob2$) emp_dep IN ($emp_dep$) user IN ($user$)

html.h1: SH - 15 - Splunk Cloud Virtual Core (SVC) Usage Analysis - Dashboard - v3 (Updated: Feb 9, 2021)

search.query: | stats count by _time | rename _time As tok_day | sort - tok_day | fieldformat Day = strftime(tok_day, "%a %b %d %Y")

panel.title: 1. Splunk Virtual Core (SVC) Usage by Market | Earliest Time: $TimeRangePkr.earliest$ | Latest Time: $TimeRangePkr.latest$

search.query: | search _time=$tok_day$ | eval Earliest_Time=_time | bin _time Span=$time_bin$ | stats Sum(eval(user_total_run_time / grand_total_run_time * Utilization)) as svc_usage Dc(emp_dep) As Num_Departments Dc(user) As Num_Users Max(License) As License Max(Utilization) As Utilization earliest(_time) as earliest_time earliest(Earliest_Time) as Earliest_Time By _time emp_lob2 | eval svc_perc = svc_usage / Utilization * 100 | eval time_deduction = case ( "$time_bin$" = "1h", 60*60, "$time_bin$" = "1d", 24*60*60, "$time_bin$" = "1w", 24*60*60*7, "$time_bin$" = "1mon", 24*60*60*30, true(),null() ) | eval latest_time = earliest_time + time_deduction | eval earliest_time = strftime(earliest_time, "%a %b %d %Y %H:%M") | eval latest_time = strftime(latest_time, "%a %b %d %Y %H:%M") | sort 0 - svc_usage | fieldformat start_time = strftime(earliest_time, "%a %b %d %Y %H:%M") | fieldformat start_time = strftime(latest_time, "%a %b %d %Y %H:%M") | fieldformat Utilization=printf("%'.2f SVC",Utilization) | fieldformat License=printf("%'d SVC",License) | fieldformat Num_Users=printf("%'d Users",Num_Users) | fieldformat Num_Departments=printf("%'d Departments",Num_Departments) | table emp_lob2 Num_Users Num_Departments svc_usage svc_perc Utilization License earliest_time latest_time | rename emp_lob2 As "Market", emp_dep As Department , svc_perc As "SVC Usage %", svc_usage As "SVC Usage", earliest_time As "SVC Start Period", latest_time As "SVC End Period"

html.h1: Click on any Market to see Department Details for the SVC Start Period --> Selected Market: $selected_market$

panel.title: 2. Splunk Virtual Core (SVC) Usage by Department for Market: ($selected_market$) $test$

search.query: | where emp_lob2="$selected_market$" | eval Earliest_Time=_time | eval selected_time=strptime("$selected_time$", "%a %b %d %Y %H:%M") | where Earliest_Time=selected_time | bin _time Span=$time_bin$ | stats Sum(eval(user_total_run_time / grand_total_run_time * Utilization)) as svc_usage Dc(user) As Num_Users Max(License) As License Max(Utilization) As Utilization earliest(_time) as earliest_time earliest(Earliest_Time) as Earliest_Time By _time emp_dep | eval svc_perc = svc_usage / Utilization * 100 | eval time_deduction = case ( "$time_bin$" = "1h", 60*60, "$time_bin$" = "1d", 24*60*60, "$time_bin$" = "1w", 24*60*60*7, "$time_bin$" = "1mon", 24*60*60*30, true(),null() ) | eval latest_time = earliest_time + time_deduction | foreach *_svc_usage [ eval <<FIELD>>=round('<<FIELD>>', 5)] | eval _time=earliest_time | eval earliest_time = strftime(earliest_time, "%a %b %d %Y %H:%M") | eval latest_time = strftime(latest_time, "%a %b %d %Y %H:%M") | sort 0 - svc_usage | fieldformat Utilization=printf("%'.2f SVC",Utilization) | fieldformat License=printf("%'d SVC",License) | fieldformat Num_Users=printf("%'d Users",Num_Users) | table emp_dep Num_Users svc_usage svc_perc Utilization License earliest_time latest_time | rename emp_dep As Department , svc_perc As "SVC Usage %", svc_usage As "SVC Usage", earliest_time As "SVC Start Period", latest_time As "SVC End Period"

html.h1: Click on any Department to see User Details --> Selected Department: $selected_department$

panel.title: 3.1 Splunk Virtual Core (SVC) Usage by User for Market: $selected_market$ and Department: $selected_department$

search.query: | where emp_lob2="$selected_market$" AND emp_dep="$selected_department$" | eval Earliest_Time=_time | eval selected_time=strptime("$selected_time$", "%a %b %d %Y %H:%M") | where Earliest_Time=selected_time | bin _time Span=$time_bin$ | stats Sum(eval(user_total_run_time / grand_total_run_time * Utilization)) as svc_usage Dc(emp_dep) As Num_Departments Dc(user) As Num_Users Max(License) As License Max(Utilization) As Utilization earliest(_time) as earliest_time earliest(Earliest_Time) as Earliest_Time Values(emp_dep) As Department Values(emp_lob2) As Market Latest(emp_name) As Name Latest(emp_title) As emp_title By _time user | eval svc_perc = svc_usage / Utilization * 100 | eval time_deduction = case ( "$time_bin$" = "1h", 60*60, "$time_bin$" = "1d", 24*60*60, "$time_bin$" = "1w", 24*60*60*7, "$time_bin$" = "1mon", 24*60*60*30, true(),null() ) | eval latest_time = earliest_time + time_deduction | foreach *_svc_usage [ eval <<FIELD>>=round('<<FIELD>>', 5)] | eval _time=earliest_time | eval earliest_time = strftime(earliest_time, "%a %b %d %Y %H:%M") | eval latest_time = strftime(latest_time, "%a %b %d %Y %H:%M") | sort 0 - svc_usage | fieldformat Utilization=printf("%'.2f SVC",Utilization) | fieldformat License=printf("%'d SVC",License) | fieldformat Num_Users=printf("%'d Users",Num_Users) | fieldformat Num_Departments=printf("%'d Departments",Num_Departments) | table user Name emp_title Market Department svc_usage svc_perc Utilization License earliest_time latest_time | rename svc_perc As "SVC Usage %", svc_usage As "SVC Usage", earliest_time As "SVC Start Period", latest_time As "SVC End Period", user As User, emp_title As Title

panel.title: 3.2 Splunk Virtual Core (SVC) Usage by User for Market: $selected_market$ and Department: $selected_department$

search.query: | where emp_lob2="$selected_market$" AND emp_dep="$selected_department$" | eval Earliest_Time=_time | eval selected_time=strptime("$selected_time$", "%a %b %d %Y %H:%M") | where Earliest_Time=selected_time | bin _time Span=$time_bin$ | stats Sum(eval(user_total_run_time / grand_total_run_time * Utilization)) as svc_usage Dc(emp_dep) As Num_Departments Dc(user) As Num_Users Max(License) As License Max(Utilization) As Utilization earliest(_time) as earliest_time earliest(Earliest_Time) as Earliest_Time Values(emp_dep) As Department Values(emp_lob2) As Market Latest(emp_name) As Name Latest(emp_title) As emp_title By _time user | eval svc_perc = svc_usage / Utilization * 100 | eval time_deduction = case ( "$time_bin$" = "1h", 60*60, "$time_bin$" = "1d", 24*60*60, "$time_bin$" = "1w", 24*60*60*7, "$time_bin$" = "1mon", 24*60*60*30, true(),null() ) | eval latest_time = earliest_time + time_deduction | foreach *_svc_usage [ eval <<FIELD>>=round('<<FIELD>>', 5)] | eval _time=earliest_time | eval earliest_time = strftime(earliest_time, "%a %b %d %Y %H:%M") | eval latest_time = strftime(latest_time, "%a %b %d %Y %H:%M") | sort 0 - svc_usage | fieldformat Utilization=printf("%'.2f SVC",Utilization) | fieldformat License=printf("%'d SVC",License) | fieldformat Num_Users=printf("%'d Users",Num_Users) | fieldformat Num_Departments=printf("%'d Departments",Num_Departments) | table user Name emp_title Market Department svc_usage svc_perc Utilization License earliest_time latest_time | rename svc_perc As "SVC Usage %", svc_usage As "SVC Usage", earliest_time As "SVC Start Period", latest_time As "SVC End Period", user As User, emp_title As Title

html.h1: Click on any User to see all search activities in SH-04 Audit Search Activity - Deep Analysis Dashboard

search.query: index=summary source="splunk-virtual-core-usage" | timechart span=1d Max(total_util) As Utilization Max(License) As License | eval Utilization=ceiling(Utilization)

panel.title: 5. Estimated SVC By Cluster and by Host

search.query: | tstats SummariesOnly=True Allow_Old_Summaries=False Sum(Search_Activity.Audit_Search.total_run_time1) AS total_run_time From DataModel=GMC Where nodename=Search_Activity.Audit_Search index=_audit earliest=-1d@d latest=-0d@d AND Search_Activity.Audit_Search.total_run_time1 > 0 By _time Span=1d host | `gmc_drop_dm_object_name(Search_Activity.Audit_Search)` | fields _time host total_run_time | eventstats sum(total_run_time) As grand_total_run_time by _time | join _time [ search index=summary source="splunk-virtual-core-usage" earliest=-1d@d latest=-0d@d | bin _time span=1d | stats Max(total_util) As Utilization Max(License) As License By _time | fields _time Utilization License ] | bin _time Span=1d | `get_shcluster_label(host)` | search shcluster_label IN ($shcluster_label$) | stats Sum(eval(total_run_time / grand_total_run_time * Utilization)) as svc_usage Max(License) As License Max(Utilization) As Utilization By _time shcluster_label host | eval svc_perc = svc_usage / Utilization * 100 | fieldformat Utilization=printf("%'.2f SVC",Utilization) | fieldformat License=printf("%'.2f SVC",License) | table _time shcluster_label host svc_usage Utilization svc_perc License
